title: Guaranteed Skin Sales?
body:
I was just wondering if they still do the guaranteed skin sales x weeks/months after a skin is released.

So 1: is this still the case? and 2: If so, how much later after release is it?

Thank you (and if this never was the case, also let me know because I do have pretty bad memory with stuff like this)

replies.body: Yes. All new skins are put on sale after a time of 4 to 6 months after they have been released.  Riot usually posts a schedule of what will be seen on sale in the coming month (not exact dates though of when said skins are on sale during that month)

Ok thanks.  For some reason I was thinking it was always about 3 months after, but as I said in the main post, I have an unreliable memory for this kinda stuff xD

Thanks again.
